<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Torchbearer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=901)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Torchbearers carry a light sources for seasoned explorers and serve as apprentices.

<column gap="tiny">

([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 14

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 12

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 9
</column>

</column>

</column>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Torchbearer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=901)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 216</row>

**Perception** +5

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Architecture Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +2, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +3

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +1

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Climbing Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14), [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (20 bolts), [Tindertwig](/Equipment.aspx?ID=138) (5), [Torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) (4)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
torch +7,
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning plus 1 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +5 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +5 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6 piercing

**Torch Combatant**   A torchbearer is adept at attacking with [torches](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) and deals 1 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) when they critically hit with a torch.

</column>
